channel.title: This Is Not a Drill on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in This Is Not a Drill on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘This Is Not a Drill’ Review: Climate Activism Doc Feels Stuck in a More Hopeful Past
item.description: Oren Jacoby follows three Davids fighting the Goliaths of the oil industry in a documentary that premiered at the Telluride Film Festival.
